name: Alien Calculator
description:
Your blue spaceship is under attack! 

You are responsible for directing the turrets towards the enemy, but you can't do any calculation. Crap !

Still, you have this old calculator next to you. See if you can do a few computations. But be quick ! Aliens are coming !

------

This game was done in 3 hours as part of the Trijam #94. The theme was "a+b=c".

-----

Assets:

UFOs: https://opengameart.org/content/alien-ufo-pack
Calculator: https://opengameart.org/content/calculator-ui
Liberation Mono Font: https://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/Liberation-Mono
Alien SFX: https://opengameart.org/content/alien-sounds
Music: https://opengameart.org/content/fast-fight-battle-music-looped
Raylib: https://github.com/raysan5/raylib
Switch SFXs: https://opengameart.org/content/51-ui-sound-effects-buttons-switches-and-clicks
Space background: https://opengameart.org/content/space-background

-----

IMPORTANT: on Linux, if you have trouble running the exe because of glibc version, get the sources and compile them. There is only one script to execute and it only requires cmake ! Enjoy.
